snippet: Under the deal, members of Congress and their aides will have to buy insurance through exchanges.
abstract: Obama administration tells Congress it will allow federal government to continue paying large share of cost of health insurance for members of Congress and their aides; under deal, they will have to buy insurance through new exchanges being set up in every state.
lead_paragraph: Under the deal, members of Congress and their aides will have to buy insurance through exchanges.

headline.main: Deal Keeps U.S. Health Care Contribution for Congress
headline.print_headline: Deal Keeps U.S. Health Care Contribution for Congress

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
